content:
68
SPOUSES' SHARES IN CO-OWNED PROPERTY
(1) Co-owned property of spouses shall belong jointly to both spouses. Shares belonging to each spouse shall not be specified in the co-owned property.
(2) A spouse may not dispose of their unspecified share of co-owned property by legal transactions inter vivos, and in particular, they may not expropriate or encumber it.
(3) Items that are part of co-owned property shall be jointly owned by the spouses.
 
FAMILY
